Detailed Description

Administrative page callbacks for Mollom module.

mollom_admin_form_options (  ) 

Return registered forms as an array suitable for a 'checkboxes' form element options property.

mollom_admin_settings ( &$  form_state  ) 

Form builder; Global Mollom settings form.

This form does not validate Mollom API keys, since the fallback method still needs to be able to be reconfigured in case Mollom services are down. mollom.verifyKey would invalidate the keys and throw an error; hence, _mollom_fallback() would invoke form_set_error(), effectively preventing this form from submitting.
